entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.7Â°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
